website_summaries.verdict: A durable pedestal fan that connects to your hose to provide a cooling mist to your outdoor recreational area.
pros: The fan can be set to oscillating so it covers a wider area
Head tilts to allow for better targeting of the mist
Can be operated without the water if you'd prefer to just have a breeze
The flowing air keeps mosquitoes and other flying nuisances away
cons: The mist can be a little heavy
Do not aim the fan in a direction that cannot get wet

customer_reviews.title: The nozzle issue is real
customer_reviews.text: Large number of reviews, so I'll be brief. Water issue is real. I used the nozzles on the fan initially, but in short order the fan saturated the assembly manual, some 20 ft. away. I changed nozzles as recommended elsewhere, and the mist was much better. I also decreased the flow of water to the fan, and that improved the quality of the mist even more. I suggest that three smaller nozzles be added to each assembly kit so the customer will have that option Also suggest manual be rewritten. Some sentences weren't clear, and important measurements (such as maximum water pressure) need to be addressed in units we use, such as pounds per square inch.
customer_reviews.author: David Maserang

customer_reviews.title: The mist jets are not fine enough. You have to place the unit 10-15 ...
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BE AWARE......I should not have bought this based on the reviews regarding "too much spray", "soaker", etc. I tend to not take negative ratings all too seriously, that bit me on this one. The mist jets are not fine enough. You have to place the unit 10-15 feet away to avoid becoming drenched. At that point, you do NOT receive any of the benefits of the fan. Do not waste your money. I have purchased finer misters, but after spending nearly $130, I find that to be beyond unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Same Quality As Past Purchases for More &
customer_reviews.text: Each summer I purchase a more expensive version of this very similar misting fan from Frontgate. I run it everyday without the water on the back porch for the dog, and then with the water while I suntan, approx 15 times a summer. By the end of the summer, the motor is blown. This year, I decided to purchase this one instead and early on, I am MJCH happier with it than the others. The assembly is very similar but it went much smoother. This fan is not as bulky and heavy as the model I purchased in the last from Frontgate.
customer_reviews.author: LML

customer_reviews.title: Well made and looks very nice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Orbit 10106 Brass and Stainless Steel Mist Nozzles at the same time that I ordered this fan, as other reviewers suggested, so this review is based on having those nozzles installed on the fan from the start. What a difference this has made on our deck! With such extreme heat this summer, this fan has been a fantastic addition to our deck. Between our market umbrellas and this misting fan, it's actually quite comfortable out there! Would definitely buy again. Can't attest to how well it holds up, as we've only had it a little over a week. But it feels solidly built with good quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Teresafahey

customer_reviews.title: Power supply continually trips.
customer_reviews.text: There is something wrong with the power supply on this fan. It constantly trips. We have tried plugging it into different outlets including GCFI outlets, but to no avail. It trips and shuts off. This happens whether the mister is connected or not. Very irritating. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: daisygirl

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo  disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Just got it was hopeful but upon plugging in buying a shorter hose to add on to existing buying extra fine nozzles. The patio is soaked. We did everything recommended... we even called Help Tech. Nothing worked. We are disabled so sitting on the patio in La is almost impossible in the summer. But I have to say Amazon was extremely nice about the return. Pain in the .......!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Krieger Chalaire

customer_reviews.title: Received Previously Returned Fan!
customer_reviews.text: I knew there was trouble when I saw the box was banged up and had been previously sent to another customer. As the pictures show, the box has been resealed, the contents had no protection, the final pieces were just sitting in the bottom of the box, and there was dirt and even a leaf in the motor! To make things worse, the middle shaft wasn't even there! So now I paid $99 for a fan I have to return. BE CAREFUL ORDERING THIS FAN!
customer_reviews.author: Maryland Techy

customer_reviews.title: Very very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Very very disappointing. Leaked all over, gave it to the Goodwill trashcan! I could tell you all the problems there were other than leaking water but what’s the point it’s not worth it to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Steve A. Rosá

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: It seems well made but was obvious that this was a previously returned item. Someone had mis assembled it previously which caused the water hose to be severely crimped cutting off most of the water flow. This we were able to fix. Also, the wster hose tubing was pulled away from the screw on coupling and we had to push it back indine and through the opening of the hose attachment end. We are hoping it stays put. We will soon find out. Other than that, it seems to be a well made fan.
customer_reviews.author: Alta

customer_reviews.title: Go Ahead and Order Replacement Mister Nozzles
customer_reviews.text: The fan itself is fine. Easy to assemble and moves air nicely. My only issue is with the manufacturer supplied "misting" nozzles. They are crap, streaming the water rather than generating a mist. Fortunately, I'd read where others had encountered the same issue and replaced them with Orbit .012 orifice misting nozzles, so I had also ordered a dozen of those from another vendor, "just in case". Sure enough, I needed them. Would I recommend this fan to others? Probably, but with the caveat that the price shown is actually another $15-20 up front to buy the actually working nozzles to replace the ones that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Price

customer_reviews.title: Works but you will get wet!
customer_reviews.text: Cool fan. Could use a larger motor, or different blade type if you want to stay with the shipped nozzles. If not, some others have recommended replacement nozzles that dong soak you. Other than that...on a hot day outside, it kept me cool, FOR SURE. I didn't get any more wet than I would have from sweat. I might make some mods, which will void my warranty, to customize for my needs. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service...
customer_reviews.text: Actually one of my fans blew a motor and I failed to contact Amazon seller in time, even though it stopped working before the guarantee had expired. Luckily! The seller was able to provide a replacement that is perfect....great product and excellent customer service. Thank you! Now our large AZ patio is a lot cooler during these hot summer months...thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Watson

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Mosquitoes Away
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this fan! I live in Houston where Mosquitos are a huge issue. I originally purchased it to keep mosquitos away and it works beautifully! The deck is mine again! I have not used the misting feature.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Alex

customer_reviews.title: The greates invention since a/c
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, this is terrific ! Even on the awful hot days we’ve had so far this summer. We have high humidity where I live, which made me pause (do I really want more moisture in the air?) but this has been great. It doesn’t even have to blow most directly on a person; it cools the air around you even if you’re not standing in the direct line of mist. It was easy to assemble and seems heavy duty. I’ve only had it for 6 weeks so I can’t really attest to longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Slp

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The reviews are accurate! The nozzles that come with the fan are worthless and quickly soak everything in range. Replacing with the finer brass nozzles was pretty easy, but creates too much pressure in the flimsy tubing, which causes the connectors to pop off! So, if you buy this fan, you will need to add nozzles and a water pressure regulator to actually use it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for long
customer_reviews.text: This fan looks amazing and it worked well for the first use. When we finally had time to put it together it was a dream. However the minute you add the hose to mist you can literally count to 10 and it either pops a fuse or just turns off. In an effort to at least have some air we tried only using it as a fan and even that continued to pop the fuse. It’s max time was 15 minutes. It can not stay on longer than that. Unfortunately we can’t return it because it was purchased in April but was not opened until July. Save your money and buy something better.
customer_reviews.author: zc goldstein

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Outside temp over 105f with humidity at about 15% made the space very comfortable. It does get a little wet close to the fan but that is normal from my experience. We have hard water so the extra heads will be handy. I always soak clogged heads in water and white vinegar to open them. Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: B. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk Broke in less than 30 days
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst fan that I've purchased from Amazon It work for less than a month And is now broken and now Amazon wants me to return it but I'm unable to Because I don't have a Box for it or anything I need this fan to To cool My barn area To help with the heat because my chickens will die if it gets over a 100゚ Would give it a 0 review if that was possible
customer_reviews.author: Anna Jones

customer_reviews.title: No mist way too much water coming out
customer_reviews.text: Fan part works good as far as the mist it's more like a super soaker completely drenched in less than a minute cant use unless maybe by a pool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save the money just make a fan out of 5 $20 bills
customer_reviews.text: Fan is crap. Got use out of it one weekend and now it doesn’t work at all. Convienently the return window just closed too. Would have been functional to just wave a $100 bill on my face for a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: awhal

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend just buying the Clippers water nozzle sprays with a ...
customer_reviews.text: The fan never ran strong enough to avoid dripping wet water bottle close to 5 feet circumference of fan. Now few months later the fan seems to decide on its own whether it's going to run at full speed which again was never really strong enough or just kind of slowly run the blades, not providing any comfort. Way way overpriced for what you get. I would recommend just buying the Clippers water nozzle sprays with a hose attachment and using an awesome outdoor fan for much less money
customer_reviews.author: KG40

customer_reviews.title: Not Good For Misting
customer_reviews.text: The good thing about this fan is that it puts out and can circulate a lot of air. The bad part is that the misting feature is more of a firehose. If anyone is within 15-feet of the “mister” they will be drenched, as well as the floor, furniture and any pets. While the fan puts out a lit of air, the misting feature is totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Missing thumb screw
customer_reviews.text: I cannot connect the the internal pole to the motor housing. The instructions keep on talking about a thumb screw (J), but it's a bolt, and it does not secure the motor housing. There is no threading in the hole where the thumb screw goes. I used the NewAir chat and customer service line. After 45' I learned that the bolt was the thumb screw. But they could not help me any further. Bringing my fan to Ace hardware. Hopefully they can help me jerry rig something to hold it together. Otherwise it works great.
customer_reviews.author: patricia goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: LIike it, good quality, does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far, did purchase the different orbit mister nozzles for it, they're cheap and very easy to install. I also have a pressure regulator on the faucet, keeping it at a low water pressure helps with the spray factor. Setup in your space won't look too pretty with the electric cord and hose connection (unless you're very clever at hiding these) but it does the job. Much better than my original misting setup that relied on the wind direction and was constantly clogged due to our hard water. I can now sit outside on a miserable 108 degree el paso day and survive and any maintenance for clogged nozzles will be easy.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary E. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after less than a week
customer_reviews.text: This fan was easy to assemble and worked well...until it didn't. Not sure if the in-line GFI went bad or something else but it won't turn on and have followed all of the troubleshooting guidelines. Pretty pricey to have it only last a week. I would assume it's defective or poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Abby P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mister fan with modifications! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Great misting fan. Absolutely love it. I followed other people’s advice and bought the Orbit Misting Nozzles (Brass & Stainless Steel Universal). I did not try the fan with the ones it came with. This product is absolutely amazing. It works for my large patio and can be felt from far away. It makes 100 degree vegas heat feel like 85. Definitely recommend! 😍
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: Increased outdoor summertime comfort!
customer_reviews.text: This fan really works! We live in southern Mississippi, a locale which features high temperatures and humidity for months at a time. But we also enjoy entertaining and eating outdoors on our patio. The misting fan was an answer to our needs- a means to increase outdoor comfort during the hottest time of day. The fan was a snap to put together; less than two ,minutes. We had power and water outlets on the patio so using the fan has been easy. As a result, the constant breeze and cooling mist is welcome and inviting. I am careful to put the fan indoors when not in use due to frequent unpredictable rain and wind conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mist fan! It does exactly what you would want it to do! Very powerful and has a great mist! And when we aren’t feeling to get wet, we just turn off the water and use the regular fan.
customer_reviews.author: jaylen hall

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice fan. The mister is quite intense
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice fan. The mister is quite intense. It really should come with the finer mister unless you want to be soaked when in front of it. Truly soaked. Or, instead of saying the "also bought with by customers" maybe saying that you definitely will want the finer mister. However, it is fairly quiet, nice looking. heavy enough not to blow over but not overly heavy.
customer_reviews.author: kjj

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and quite.
customer_reviews.text: Great fan, quite and right size. Problem, mist doesnt work just sosks everything. The humidity in Florida is very high so that may affect this function. I use it without the mist.
customer_reviews.author: Ena

customer_reviews.title: Total disappointment, only gave one star because I couldn’t do zero
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product I have ever bought. Assembly very unclear. Once we got it together the fan was very loud had to take apart and reassemble it. Then the fan was quiet but the misters didn’t work. I replaced the nozzles and it the product worked for all of an hour. Next time I went to use it would not even power on. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A Gross

customer_reviews.title: Fan breaker keeps turning off fan
customer_reviews.text: The breaker keeps tripping and stopping the fan. I replaced the fuse in the fan and still the breaker stops. This started to happen only 1 month after use. Its now 90 degrees outside and we have no mister to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It does work but sprays out too heavy a load of water and of course the puddling problem. Just moved to AZ so looked for a quick fix for patio for the extreme heat. Next year we will have a pro mister installed as this fan and imagine others just like it may help in the short run but it is like dipping into a swimming pool to have that much water turned on you. Would not repurchase as was hoping for a really fine mist.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Randomly stops working
customer_reviews.text: While the fan is on, it randomly turns off. If I wiggle the power box, it starts again. I’ve been away on business so I hadn’t used it often. I’m not happy with this unit. My return date was 12 days ago.
customer_reviews.author: Nini

customer_reviews.title: Sprays out too much water
customer_reviews.text: This fan is fine without the misting, but when you turn on the water it comes out pretty heavy. Within just a few minutes of having this on spraying across our sectional on the deck, the cushions are too wet to sit on. We tried to adjust the flow of the water with the valve but it is just to hard to get it to the right volume. We still use the fan, we just do not turn on the water any longer.
customer_reviews.author: william s.

customer_reviews.title: Misty cool! Great value
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our outside break area at the office. Hot oppressive summer in Florida is held at bay! You need to turn down the water pressure some unless you want everything in front of it to be wet. Other than that it knocks the ambient temperature down 10 or more degrees. It stays outside even in inclement weather. The only time we brought it in was for the recent hurricane but that was to keep it from being blown away. Great buy and great value compared to others for hundreds more
customer_reviews.author: Ken K

customer_reviews.title: Save your Money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fan even with negative reviews on water streaming as I thought folks were just not setting the water pressure correctly. Purchased the recommended Orbit Brass Mist Nozzle to reduce water output. No matter where the water pressure was set, it put out too much water. It did not cool the patio 20 degrees as mentioned. Patio floor became too wet to safely walk on. Save your money, this one is waste of time and money .
customer_reviews.author: susan s.

customer_reviews.title: Love the air flow of this fan!
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a quality product! We use this fan on our patio and it really pushes air. Not kidding, if you need air flow like we do in the south this is a great fan. Honestly have not used the most part yet but I’m sure it’s going to feel awesome. Very good quality I must say. Oh and it’s pretty quiet too which I like.
customer_reviews.author: MARK S

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough about this fan!!! We use it everyday! I’m looking froward to our hot dry summer when the misters will really come in handy on the back patio. Love love love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you need a great shower, this is the product
customer_reviews.text: Once again, I was suckered in to 4 and 5 star reviews. How can anybody "rave" about a product that will soak anything in it's path within 5 minutes. Everything on our porch was soaked! The furniture, the floor and us. It took a half-hour to wipe everything dry. Trying to adjust the water flow is a waste of time. At the lowest volume, it's still to much water because the misting nozzles are just to large for this unit. As I'm writing this, I realized this product would work great in your garden. Wide coverage and plenty of water.
customer_reviews.author: jnjj

customer_reviews.title: I now love sitting on my back deck.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this fan for close to a month and I live in west central Florida. It's hot and humid. I have no complaints whatsoever. I purchased it with the suggested Orbit 10106H nozzles and the Orbit 10109W filter (get them). Added bonus... the mosquitos are blown away too.
customer_reviews.author: Jordon

customer_reviews.title: It works well!
customer_reviews.text: 10106H misting nozzles were used to replace the ones that came with the misting fan. This is a 4 minute change out with no tools. I highly recommend this fan. You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Parese-enterprise

customer_reviews.title: Used and damaged fan was sent. Expect to get soaked!
customer_reviews.text: Item waa definitely used previously. It came scratched up all across the front grill and center of logo. Plus, there was water in the line. Power cord is ridiculously short so now I will need an extension cord and a cover where the two plugs are joined. Water output is intense. You can't stand within 6 feet of it and not get drenched. I'm going to try moving it to a different direction to test it out more, but a good chance that I'll need to return it.
customer_reviews.author: leesee1221

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last very long... disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Cons: quit working after only a few months of light use even though we kept it covered and protected from weather when not using it. The mist is not really mist; the flow is so strong that it soaks you (and everything around you) within seconds. Pros: the fan puts out a lot of air. The unit was sturdy and it was easy to put it together. Too bad it conked out so soon!
customer_reviews.author: dolphinheron

customer_reviews.title: Nozzles clogged 2nd time using
customer_reviews.text: Fan was easy to assemble. Output of air as expected. However, the nozzles for misting clogged on second use. Also note that we attached an in line hose filter to manage calcium build up prior to first use. We soaked the nozzles in CLR overnight, reattached and tried but 2 didn’t work and the third just drizzled. We ordered two but never opened the box for the second one and returned both.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: No complaints, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why this fan has so many negative reviews. I saw many people say the mist is too strong, I disagree. There's no point in a misting fan if it doesn't adequately mist. It works great and comes with additional misting heads.
customer_reviews.author: hayesc926

customer_reviews.title: i’m missing pieces. don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.text: i tried contacting seller like i can on others and it won’t let me. i need some money back. i’m missing the on and off nozzle and the rubber pieces that go inside for the misting.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It's just awesome when you kids are playing outside and it's 95F
customer_reviews.text: It's just awesome when you kids are playing outside and it's 95F! First, the kids love to get wet. Second, this thing significantly cools down the area even outside of the moisture radius. When it becomes too hot, we simply set it up nearby pointing in parallel of our location (to not get wet), and it does it work.
customer_reviews.author: Igor V. Zavoychinskiy

customer_reviews.title: Good but with a catch
customer_reviews.text: Good volume of air that comes from the fan. Despite the ability to dial down the amount of water coming to the fan, it still tends to put out too much water. Not so much a fine mist, but a light soaking which results in standing water on the table and wet food if used when eating outside. Felt like I needed a bathing suit on while using the fan, but no one wants to see that....
customer_reviews.author: mike gill

customer_reviews.title: Dead as a doornail after two months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in June. Turned it on last weekend for a party and it wasn’t working. Had an electrician come out and check outlets today. All outlets fine. Fan is dead. Used maybe six times since June. HUGE WASTE OF MONEY. AND to top it off we kept it covered to protect it from the rain. Just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Reg

customer_reviews.title: Works okay but...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it works okay but it is flimsy. I'd guess a $39.95 fan with three water jets in front. It's clumsy and flimsy....not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan for the family when it is hot outside
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Some reviewers stated that the misters needed to be replaced, but we have had no problems thus far. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: This fan had problems from the start. Should’ve returned ...
customer_reviews.text: This fan had problems from the start. Should’ve returned it then. Doesn’t work at all now. Changed spray nozzle too. Never sprayed well. Just taking up space in my garage. Cord was bulky w the reset buttons built on to end of plug. Never had a strong blowing capability even on high. We all have regrets. This is one of mine
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Keeps heat at bay.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and hook up to water source. Have enjoyed it immensely on the patio this past summer. Three speeds of relief.
customer_reviews.author: indylou

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought the fan several months ago. Easy to assemble and good with everything else except the misting part . The misting part totally sucks can’t use at all. If I wanted a shower I would have bought a outdoor shower. I am very surprised with all the complaints that the company hasn’t try to correct the problem or contact the people that bought the prouduct and offer a solution .i guess they just don’t care. Another poor example.
customer_reviews.author: stewart gable

customer_reviews.title: Water hose not secured to valve end
customer_reviews.text: Like many people have mentioned the misters aren’t fine enough for our patio space. Moreover, the water hose Is poorly connected to the valve that attaches to a garden hose. It blew apart the very first time I turned the water on. It looks like it relies on tension only - zero adhesive connecting it to the valve. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ceej271

customer_reviews.title: Nozzles spray like a fire hose.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working one month after purchase. Fan continually trips the internal GFI. It was great for the short time it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stavropoulos

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Doesn't leak and the mist travel far! Definitely satisfied with this fan...especially for this hot summer!
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this fan!!!
customer_reviews.text: A terrible product. Did not produce a mist but rather spewed forth 3 streams of water which saturated every thing and person in the immediate vicinity. Tried repeatedly to adjust brass misting valves but to no avail. A piece of Chinese junk.
customer_reviews.author: Alan J. Jennerich

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I saw previous reviews where people were saying to much weather comes out. I didn’t have any issues at all. My suggestion is to turn the fan on to the speed you like and then gradually turn on the water. If you have to much pressure it’s not a mister, it’s a hose connected to the fan.
customer_reviews.author: Nypalm

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Kids love to play around it, keeps a good sized area outdoors cooler. Only regret is not buying one last summer.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: It does the job !!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t too difficult to assemble. Does a nice job of cooling in the hot Carolina sun. It is a bit noisy so I couldn’t listen to my patio speaker because I would have had to turn it up too loud. I did not use the misting,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product i live in phoenix so you could imagine. Drops température at leat 10 degrees
customer_reviews.author: geronimo

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Misting function soaks everything nearby. I bought it mostly because I use it on an outside deck and it is waterproof that part works great I don’t know if it’s worth buying new nozzles that some people have said will work
customer_reviews.author: William S. Stromberger

customer_reviews.title: No one likes it when it's to hot to sit outside this makes it so enjoyable everyone at the party commented on how nice it was wi
customer_reviews.text: Arrived just in time for the party and it was such a success... No one likes it when it's to hot to sit outside this makes it so enjoyable everyone at the party commented on how nice it was with the mister on. If it's hot where you live this is a necessity. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: andrea227

customer_reviews.title: Bad Circuit Breaker
customer_reviews.text: This was great for the first 2 months it worked. I thought the mister was perfect but now I can’t even get the fan to stay turned on. The power button on the circuit breaker doesn’t work anymore. Sometimes I can get it to work for a few minutes but then it clicks off again. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My kids love this! We can be outside under the patio roof at all times during the day without getting hot at all! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MommyResort

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dogs, it’s adjustable which is great for them. A little loud but doesn’t bother us.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Buy a misting kit and put it on a fan you already have.
customer_reviews.text: The product did not work right out of the box. The fan is fine but the quality of the mist is heavy or nonexistent, it needed maintenance on day one. I bought a $20 misting kit and attached it to the fan and it works fine. So what I have is a $120 fan. The poorest quality purchase I made from Amazon ever!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: makes sunbathing feel like your a king
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works great. Got the filter for it.Does a great job of misting a big area.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Chill
customer_reviews.text: This fan is great. Only problem is that it puts out too much water. However if you oscillate and it’s really hot outside it works well. May not want to sit too close, but when that mist hits you and cools you down, it’s fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This fan exceeded my expectations. It puts out a LOT of water, so you will need to adjust the water flow to the fan, but otherwise this keeps my patio a good 5-10 degrees cooler. When its 113 like yesterday, (Las Vegas, NV) It makes being on the patio grilling or relaxing a whole lot better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not last 2 full summers
customer_reviews.text: Less than 2 years old and broken. Motor comes on but blades wont turn. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Natalie O.

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work after a couple months
customer_reviews.text: Also Purchased new heads and the calcium filter which do nothing. A complete waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Beachy

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly designed and made
customer_reviews.text: This fan is very poorly made. We have been using it for about a month and it has broken down three times. The flexible tubing that brings the water to the jets has come loose internally twice. It had to disassemble the fan to fix that. And the plastic handle used to turn the water on and off actually broke off when I tried to turn it with my hand. These are design / quality issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Continues to trip off and we have to continually reset ...
customer_reviews.text: Continues to trip off and we have to continually reset. Only had a month and now not working at all. We continually have to change the fuse in the cord. How do I contact seller. I do not see a link to this on my order? I should be able to return and get a refund after only a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okey
customer_reviews.text: The fan covert shakes when its on. I checked all the assemble and everything looks tight but its still vibrates
customer_reviews.author: Linda Montano

customer_reviews.title: Broke and costs too much to repair
customer_reviews.text: We received it in early June 2018. Used it twice. Last week, I used the oscillating function but decided it was too broad of a sweep so I wanted to turn off the oscillating. I pulled the clutch knob, which came off and the oscillating continued. I was able to pull the switch out, and stop the oscillating, by using a needle nose pliers. It will cost $24 to get it shipped to California and repaired and will take 1-2 weeks. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Just good for one year
customer_reviews.text: After 1 year of service, it breaks down (security plug). No good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Using this on your deck or in your yard is great, the water tends to lay after awhile.
customer_reviews.text: Totally love this fan.he t I bought one for my sister in GA for her b-day, she loves it. I just bought another one for one of our friend for her b-day. Its great since you can use it with or without the mister. Great sturdy fan.
customer_reviews.author: Denise B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a hot day
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for hot days in Texas and it worked great. I would like a finer mist, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Shatondra

customer_reviews.title: Good product at good price.
customer_reviews.text: Good product and a good price. I agree with other reviews on purchasing different nozzles. It was easy install of the fan and the different nozzles. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Fan works perfectly. Be aware that if it is very humid, the mister becomes a shower. Not the fault of the fan. When it's humid, we don't use the mister, just the fan. When the humidity isn't so heavy, it's ideal for our lanai. Summer in SW Florida is much nicer with this fan!
customer_reviews.author: wallycrow

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointed.  Big waste of money
customer_reviews.text: We have tried every conceivable combination of speed, oscillation, mist power, distance, height and the only way it cools you is if you get close enough to be wet all the time. VERY disappointed. Also if there is the slightest breeze going toward the fan you get nothing. The fan blows and the mister mists but it just doesn't cool anything
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Soaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a soaker not a mister, we barely turn water on and it sprays too much water. I wish I tested when I bought it but had to get a new hose first. Tried it on the 4th even in Texas heat it was not what we wanted or expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: really great mister fan
customer_reviews.text: Living in an area where we easily get weeks of 100+ degree weather, this mister fan allows us to still enjoy our outdoor patio. My father-in-law loves our so much that I got him one for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: gocode03

customer_reviews.title: Terrific fan
customer_reviews.text: On sale this is a terrific deal. It does exactly what the description says. Perfect on my patio when the temperature rises.
customer_reviews.author: DJP

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap, but it works
customer_reviews.text: It's still working after a few months, but that's about the best I would say about it. It's wobbly and feels really cheap when you assemble it. But still, the motor is still running and the fan still works, and that's the most important thing, right?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay cool!
customer_reviews.text: It blows are and/or a water mist. It you blow water, the mist will settle and there will be wetness, but it combats the awful heat here in the Deep South! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: BaMa YeLLa HaMMa

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great, however, they have a built in circuit breaker on the power cable. My fan worked for all of about three hours until the circuit breaker popped. Then reset button will not stay set. If you're lucky and it does finally catch, you get maybe 3 minutes of use before it pops again. Pure garbage...
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan!
customer_reviews.text: This fan was exactly what I wanted for my screened in porch. Didn't matter how hot the summer got, the fan kept me comfortable. Not too noisy.
customer_reviews.author: GrammieJan

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after just 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: The fan just stopped working after 2 months of sporadic use. We didn't use it everyday, and when we used it, it was only for a few hours. Don't waste your money, look a different fan.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: easy assemle, but very wet
customer_reviews.text: It definitely works to cool, but leaves things very wet. Easy assembly
customer_reviews.author: Katherine LaPier

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to assemble. We have it on our deck and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Fan works well, but the control switch is VERY ...
customer_reviews.text: Fan works well, but the control switch is VERY sensitive - too much so. We often are getting too much water being sprayed from it, but when turning the knob just a smidgen, the water stops completely. Our solution was to place the fan so far away from us that we weren't feeling the heavy spray.....not ideal, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: babyboomerkid

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan mister works well if there is no wind
customer_reviews.author: Delores Gotch

customer_reviews.title: Stacey Puryear, Memphis TN
customer_reviews.text: Love my mist fan, just perfect for my new patio deck we had built. Enjoying the comfort of outdoors, the mist fan is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Puryear

customer_reviews.title: More of a spitter than mister
customer_reviews.text: It is a good fan and really affordable. Just the fan alone keeps us much cooler. The mister though, mostly spits water. I seem to remember people saying I needed to buy upgraded nozzles and I had no idea what they were talking about but not I want to go back and read those reviews to find out what to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Julian

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This worked good for a few months. Now it blows the gfi on cord and doesn't stay on at all. Junk for the money it costs.
customer_reviews.author: tim willihnganz

customer_reviews.title: Puts out a lot of spray
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything, but too much spray. Put tooth picks in 2 of the 3 spray nozzels, and its great. If there was a way to turn the nozzels off that you don't want on that would be great. I'll probably buy some screws to replace two of the nozzels easy fix, unless you like lots of water, then just leave it alone.
customer_reviews.author: John H

product_meta.title: NewAir, AF-520B, Outdoor Misting Oscillating Pedestal Fan with Five Gentle Mist Nozzles, 500 Square Foot Effective Range, Black
product_meta.description:
Keep cool all summer long with this powerful dry misting fan that provides up to 500 square feet of cooling coverage. Featuring three fan speeds, wide-angle oscillation, and a slim design, this outdoor fan offers powerful cooling for your backyard, patio, park, or event space. This oscillating tower fan is also energy-efficient and eco-friendly. Instead of freon and other chemicals, get climate control that uses clean water evaporation and lower your outdoor temperatures by as much as 10°F. 

This unit is compatible with a standard 0.75-inch garden hose for evaporative cooling in arid climates, and also features a 2400 CFM fan. You'll enjoy cool breezes and plenty of great features no matter the weather. 

NewAir is a company family owned since 2002. All products are tested and have the highest safety certification. Our products are backed by a one year warranty. With high-quality products and excellent customer service, NewAir is a name you can trust.
feature_bullets: COOL MIST FAN - This misting cooling fan is perfect for chill summer patios, pool parties, and BBQs
FEATURES - With 3 fan speeds, wide-angle oscillation, and a slim design this mist fan has it all
ECO-FRIENDLY - Instead of freon and other chemicals, get climate control that uses clean evaporation
QUALITY - This personal misting fan is made with quality materials, to keep you comfy all day
NEWAIR - With good quality products and excellent customer service, NewAir is a name you can trust

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,530 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
